title: 5 STAR LUXURY HOME
posting_body: AMAZING HOME WITH TONS OF UPGRADES GALORE FEATURES CUSTOM CABINETRY, LARGE KITCHEN ISLAND, TORLY’S CORK FLOORING THRUOUT 2ND LEVEL WITH CUSTOM WINDOW COVERINGS, SURROUND SOUND, RECESS LIGHTING & MUCH MORE.
ONTO YOUR PRIVATE BALCONY & ENJOY A RELAXING MEAL WITH SPECTACULAR MOUNTAIN VIEWS.
MSTR BDRM FEATURES UPGRADED CABINETRY, COUNTERTOPS, CLOSETS, WALK IN SHOWER & MORE.
CUSTUM CURVED STAIRCASING TAKES YOU DOWNSTAIRS TO 2 BDRMS OR OPTION/DEN, W/ FULL BATH, LNDRY ROOM,4 UPGRADED ROLLADEN SHUTTERS, AND MAPLE LAMINTE/TILE FLOORING.
STEPS AWAY TAKES YOU OUT TO THE LARGE BACKYARD FEATURING ALMAWOOD PERGOLA PATIO WITH CUSTOM LANDSCAPE.
THIS SMART HOME HAS SOLAR TILES FOR REDUCED ENERGY BILLS, TUCKED AWAY IN A QUIET CULDESAC, STEPS AWAY TO 2 PARKS, WALKING & BIKE TRAILS, POOLS & TENNIS COURTS.
NEXT TO DOWNTOWN SUMMERLIN, HOME OF THE LV BALL PARK, GOLDEN KNIGHTS PRACTICE AREA, FARMERS MARKET, RETAIL & RESTAURANTS & MUCH MORE!
HURRY, THIS HOME WILL NOT LAST LONG!
